summary: This bill, the "Maternal and Infant Delivery Wellness and Integration with Vital Expertise Support for Service Members Act of 2025" (MIDWIVES for Service Members Act of 2025), directs the Secretary of Defense to establish a five-year pilot program providing midwife services to covered beneficiaries under the TRICARE program. The Secretary is required to submit implementation and annual reports detailing costs, beneficiary demographics, care assessments, patient satisfaction, access to care, program effectiveness, and recommendations. The bill considers making the program permanent based on its success, potentially impacting maternal and fetal health within the military.
